# Reports Directory

This directory contains generated reports and figures:

## Structure

```
reports/
├── figures/                    # Generated visualizations
│   ├── attention_maps/         # ViT attention visualizations
│   ├── confusion_matrices/     # Model confusion matrices
│   └── comparison_charts/      # Model comparison charts
├── model_comparison.csv        # Metrics comparison table
└── comparison_summary.txt      # Text summary report
```

## Generated Files

- `model_comparison.csv` - CSV with metrics for all models
- `comparison_summary.txt` - Text summary of results
- `*_classification_report.txt` - Detailed classification reports
